segments.text: I don't know what to say . This can't be happening . Here's the obituary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really there ? This all seems so surreal-like it's all one big nightmare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it explains why Taylor isn't answering and Femi took time off from work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Poor Femi . Taylor's death must have made her realize that she still cared for him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This says the viewing is at Myers Funeral Home today until five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's already half past four . We should go and pay our respects . Taylor's family will be there .
segments.speaker: S2
